ja64:1.1: A wife expects her husband to be nice to her when she has been good; and she is nice to him when she has been bad. These complex emotions confuse her husband, so he is advised to simply ignore her feelings.
ja64:1.3: _Thīnaṁ_ is genitive plural, glossed _itthīnaṁ_. | The Dhamma is also “hardto understand” ([snp3.12:59.1]()).
